comment: Very easy if you show up and read the book. Sad we didn't learn Final Cut Pro. But we did alot of work on Premier. Group participation is mandatory. You learn alot about news. Know your current events for pop quizes. Overall very sweet lady. Received an A. Tests aren't straightforward but not hard. Would take her again. Highly recommended.
Very easy if you show up for class and submit everything. She's a very easy grader and this class is fun if you put your mind to it.
Professor Wood is a little spacey, but overall a good Prof.  She is helpful and lenient, and very encouraging.  The room is absolutely freezing, bring a jacket!

Loved this class!  Don't be intimidated by final cut pro,the more you use it the easier it gets.  Take notes while she is teaching that part of the class.  She goes fast. Three tests, the final is cumulative.  The projects are good, better if you have a good group, but you do switch every project so don't worry.  Dress warm.  Room is cold!
Tests were hard, but professor tried to be helpful. Don't underestimate her. She genuinely wants you to learn. Material can be dull, but come to class no matter what!

Wood is a interesting teacher. A little eccentric, but very nice. The exams were HARD, and quite tricky. The side work was easy and she graded very fairly. You have to do a 5 min presentation, which is easy and painless. She is the nicest teacher, but seems a little disorganized when she lectures.
Great instructor; opportunity for extra credit; easy easy easy!!
Just go to class do your assignments and it is an easy A. She will do everything she can to help bring your grade up if you just go to class.
she'd really nice and tries to help everyone get a good grade.

Com1109 doesn't know what it wants to be. A cross between film appreciation and public speaking with some interpersonal communications concepts sprinkled in. View 3 or 4 videos/movies and draw conclusions about relationships. 1 individual speaking assignment (5min) but in a class of 80, watching other students occupies most of the class. 1 thumb up

Mrs. Wood is a great professor. She is actually interested in whether or not your learning, not just if you remeber something from the book. She efficiently mixes practical lessons with textbook knowledge. She seems interested in the whole learning process, which makes anyone eager to learn if thats what you came to class for.

Great teacher to have, she is not sparatic at all at least not to me. A very sweet lady that cares about her class no matter the size. She answers any and all questions in class and in email. Pay attention in class, keep good notes, read your chapters,(you will pass her tests with ease) and do well on your two major projects and you will do great!

scattered but just read the book= A, notes on WEBCT are the test exactly (w/ a lil inference).  2 big projects, work hard on them, pick group wisely, careful who you sit next to (that may be your group). She's very nice, but people get frustrated with her b/c other than needing a good attendance grade, no point in goin to class.
